page.title: 20THE PROGRESS THEATRE
page.content: { Progress Theatre,The Mount,Reading.} The Progress Theatre is small and they cannot fit all the things in there. They have to keep some things in a store room somewhere else. The actors have to use heavy lipstick because the lights would make the lipstick seem dull. The theatre has 104 seats. In the winter they had to get the heaters to go in the dressing rooms. They have small lights. Sometimes they have big iron struts but sometimes they have a lot of small wooden struts for the lights. They have a special work shop for repairing lights. Sometimes it takes a long time to rehearse a play. Mrs Thorpe one of our teachers has been in several plays, one of which was "Blithe Spirit". (Christchurch Primary School)
